description: This script is a shell script that terminates a set of container-related processes and cleans up network and filesystem configurations typically associated with the k3s Kubernetes distribution. It includes functions for process tree traversal, process termination, unmounting and removing files, deleting network namespaces, and deleting network interfaces related to CNI plugins.

methods.name: pschildren
methods.description: Retrieves the child processes of a given parent process ID.

methods.name: pstree
methods.description: Recursively prints the process tree starting from given process IDs.

methods.name: killtree
methods.description: Kills a process and all its child processes.

methods.name: getshims
methods.description: Finds process IDs of containerd-shim processes.

methods.name: do_unmount_and_remove
methods.description: Unmounts and removes filesystem paths matching a given prefix.
